website_summaries.verdict: Dollar-for-dollar, there aren't many Bluetooth headphone pairs that feel and sound as good as the Skullcandy Grind Wireless.
pros: Powerful audio performance with rich bass and crisp, well-defined highs

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, great sounding Bluetooth headphones!!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed so far. Really comfortable for on-ear headphones, honestly I can wear these for ages with no issues, the headband also extend for a great fit on my fairly large noggin. Crucially these Bluetooth headphones sound fantastic (despite not using AptX codec). Bass levels are spot on for me - not overpowering, but definitely pronounced (might be a bit heavy for some, highly subjective area I know). Battery life seems good too, they look great too - understated and cool. Really delighted so far, can't recommend highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sahil

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, reasonably priced headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair of these headphones, the first having lasted 4 years. I was very happy with the first pair and even more happy that the second are now half the price I paid for the originals. OK the sound is not as good as a beats set but I can buy 8 of these for the price of a set of beats headphones. Maybe not for hardcore musos, but for general video watching I think they are great
customer_reviews.author: Majotty

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: First impressions after a couple of days of wearing them at work are great. I can block out the annoying, loud project managers on their 2 hours phone calls, sound quality is good, a little bassy. Look good, not too huge and ostentatious. Very comfortable, I've had them on for 6 hours today and only just starting to annoy me. Battery has lasted all that time so far on a full charge. Can't speak to their longevity yet, but will update when I can.
customer_reviews.author: Pol

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Great product overall, great sound and battery life. Only problem is the comfort on them, after about 2-3 hours you ears may hurt a little bit, may be better for children with a smaller head but for an average adult size head it may be uncomfortable after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Stoopid_Snot

customer_reviews.title: No good for me.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds a bit meh and not very loud. I've had them a day and after 30mins of wearing they hurt my ears, suppose you get what you pay for. Guess I'm gonna have to pay £100 for the Bose on ear headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as Computer Headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on an amazon deal - they don't come with a bluetooth dongle so you may have to buy one of them - but simple to set up - simple to use - good sound quality - solid build quality - and I get a full day's use out of them before a lovely lady tells me the battery is low. Even if it is low - you can plug it in to the headphone jack like a regular set. I recommend them. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Phil McCool

customer_reviews.title: I love these. Battery lasts all day sitting at my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Battery lasts all day sitting at my desk. They are well built and comfortable. They do pinch your ears a bit so to reduce the pressure ( I have sensitive ears😔) I just gently bent the head band. It is very robust and made of metal so I didn't worry about breaking it. Sound is great for Bluetooth. Controls work nicely. And the call quality via the mic in the headset is great.
customer_reviews.author: NovemberNick

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: They're really great headphones. Everything about it is pretty much perfect, there's only one flaw - when used outside, especially near a loud road the volume needs to be cranked way up. Something I didn't think about before when using in ear buds. For that price though it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: paulo

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by the quality of sound for the price as I wasn't willing to fork out loads. Easy to use, comfortable and nice sleek design. I have quite a small head and ears so they sit very nicely but perhaps wouldn't work as well if your head and/or ears are on the larger size. Otherwise, couldn't recommend them more!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Vieira

customer_reviews.title: Cheap feeling, unreliable and no base
customer_reviews.text: Volume isn’t that loud. Base is non existent. Durability is terrible, very cheap feeling and the ear cover comes off by the way! Oh and if you lose it, skullcandy don’t actually do replacements of ear caps, they said you have to buy a brand new pair of headphones, AGAIN! Not good enough. Only lasted me 3-4 months, already looking in to buying another branded pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Akib Abdel-Khalik

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and great battery life. Sound quality is really good like more expensive ones. Looks sturdy and quite comfortable for my ears. Connects to phone or tablet in seconds and does not loose connection.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: Can't decide if I like the sound of these better than the uproar. These are better made nicer to look at, better battery and bigger plus you can plug them in if the battery is dead. Maybe the uproar bass is nicer and they are lighter. Prefer uproar for running and these for everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W.

customer_reviews.title: I have a noisy boyfriend.
customer_reviews.text: He loves to watch videos and play games on his phone, tablet and TV. This was an ingenious birthday present from yours truly. He loves his headphones. I have no more headaches. He can wear them for hours with no discomfort and the sound quality I would expect from a more expensive brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones, Great value
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, great sound with good bass, battery good & long lasting, the only thing they can get a little uncomfortable on my ears after a long wear, but that's probably due to my pointy pixie ears :D !
customer_reviews.author: MadCat

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I've had
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, easy Bluetooth connection and the most comfortable headphones I've ever worn. The sound quality matches any headphones I've had and I wore them on a train journey of over 4 hours which is much longer than I've been able to wear any before. Not had any issues with them and no problems with battery life. Can't wait to try them out on the beach on holiday.
customer_reviews.author: pidsmith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones for its price !
customer_reviews.text: They arrived so fast in perfect condition, really nice headphones very well made love the fit the sound is great very easy to set up love them !
customer_reviews.author: Sebi Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: worth every pennie.
customer_reviews.text: absolutley brilliant headphones. comfortable to ware great sound.. One of the biggest bonuses I find is thier strong aswell. 10/10 without a doubt also once you answer your phone and talk to people though them it's always crystal clear. p.s so easy to set up with phone and you don't have to use wireless if you don't want to. what more can I say!
customer_reviews.author: lewis hayes

customer_reviews.title: On a par with other of quadruple price range.
customer_reviews.text: Ace quality for the price, On a par with other of quadruple price range.
customer_reviews.author: Michaelmas Goosed

customer_reviews.title: poor battery life!
customer_reviews.text: poor battery life! , otherwise the quality , material, sound...all good!
customer_reviews.author: Meszaros Gabor

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones. Like them.
customer_reviews.text: Yup. Five stars. Great sound. Mic works great on calls. Can’t complain in this early stage.
customer_reviews.author: C. Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Not my bag
customer_reviews.text: Ok sound quality Returned product, not a comfortable fit, but is a personal thing, product was not faulty
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Barclay

customer_reviews.title: Worse headsets ever
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this product is not worth the effort. From delivery to dustbin exactly 36 hours.
customer_reviews.author: leon nicholls

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery life
customer_reviews.text: Husband very impressed with the headphones as a Christnas gift. Particularly pleased with battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing set of headphones. You will not be disappointed. Sound and comfort are second to none.
customer_reviews.author: Grahamer72

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life
customer_reviews.text: Good battery life, easy to use, comfortable, sound is not as good as my (wired) Bose but not far off.
customer_reviews.author: Tanelorn

customer_reviews.title: well pleased with these headphones great sound easy use
customer_reviews.text: well pleased with these headphones great sound easy use.Battery life very good only problem tend to fall off when moving around
customer_reviews.author: Tom T

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and good quality. Reasonable price as well. I like these so much I have 3 pairs and gave 1 pair to my son.
customer_reviews.author: Mr C.A.Knight

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price, really.
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price, sound well, the bass is good, recomend it, the day after bougth another for my son. Like it.
customer_reviews.author: Werner

customer_reviews.title: Great product a bit annoying connecting to blue tooth & ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product a bit annoying connecting to blue tooth & after a while not so comfortable in my head but great performance regarding sound & battery. I would recommend it indeed.
customer_reviews.author: DANTE B.

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound but buttons stopped working after six weeks build quality very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she really love it, easy to use and pretty good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Yann

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: great product and affordable price, Thank you for being Skullcandy
customer_reviews.author: Hristiyan Hristov

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these, provides a good experience and the build quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Elspudo

customer_reviews.title: Great compliment to the iphone 7plus
customer_reviews.text: These have good sound quality work well for phone Calls also and have had good battery life. If you hold the on off button down you will hear a bleep when they turn off this is where some people on here leaving negative reviews have gone wrong saying the battery doesn't last...because they've forgotten to turn them off. They work well charge in reasonable time and fundamentally are the best of the cheaper options. I find they're comfortable to wear if it's only for a couple of hours. More than that and they do feel like they're squashing your ears, but in all fairness most if not all headphones I feel would feel like that
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My little niece (12 years old & fussy beyond belief) absolutely loves these!!! :) : ) : )
customer_reviews.author: Mcand

product_meta.title: Skullcandy Grind Bluetooth Wireless On-Ear Headphones - Black/Chrome
product_meta.description:
Grind wireless delivers premium build and sound quality just like the wired version that inspired it and like the original, it does it all without the premium price while also adding Bluetooth wireless listening and 12 long hours of battery life. For conveniently keeping you in control, it also has a built-in microphone and track, call, and volume controls built right into the ear cup.

PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Headphone type: Bluetooth on-ear
 * Product dimensions: 205 x 92 x 245 mm (L x W x H)
 * Item weight: 180 g
 * Shipping weight: 1.09 kg
 * Speaker driver: 40 mm
 * Impedance: 33 ohms
 * Sound pressure: 98 db at 1 kHz 1 mW
 * THD: <0.1 per cent (1 mW/500 Hz)
 * Frequency response: 20-200 Hz



BOX CONTAINS


1 x Grind wireless, 02. 3.5 mm backup AUX cable, micro USB to USB charging cable
feature_bullets: Pack a punch; 40 mm audio drivers tuned with Skullcandy’s sound make all types of music sound equally impressive
Cut the cord; a premium-built headphone with killer looks packing the cord-free convenience of Bluetooth wireless audio
Go all day; you gotta sleep sometime, but until you do, grind wireless will keep you going with 12 long hours of battery life
Never, ever stop; if you’ve transcended the need to sleep and your 12 hours battery needs charging, just plug in the included AUX cord and never miss a beat
